ResourceHeader.Description:
NASA's Nimbus 7 spacecraft was launched
on 1978-10-24 into a ~950 km polar orbit and operated until 1993.
It carried eight experiments:

* (1) limb infrared monitoring of the stratosphere (LIMS),
* (2) stratospheric and mesopheric sounder (SAMS),
* (3) coastal-zone color scanner (CZCS),
* (4) stratospheric aerosol measurement II (SAM II),
* (5) earth radiation budget (ERB),
* (6) scanning multichannel microwave radiometer (SMMR),
* (7) solar backscatter UV and total ozone mapping spectrometer (SBUV/TOMS), and
* (8) temperature-humidity infrared radiometer (THIR).
